meanings.definition: Ovalbumin: a protein found in egg whites.
meanings.sent1: The ovalbumin in egg whites helps to provide structure to baked goods.
meanings.sent2: When you crack open an egg, the ovalbumin is the clear part that surrounds the yolk.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ovalbumin refuse to go to the party? It was too busy holding the egg together!
meanings.sent4: The ovalbumin in egg whites is like the glue that holds everything together in a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The ovalbumin is like a building block, essential for the structure of the egg white.

meanings.definition: Ovalbumin: the main protein component of egg white.
meanings.sent1: Cooking denatures the ovalbumin in egg white, changing its structure.
meanings.sent2: Egg white consists mainly of ovalbumin, which provides a source of protein.
meanings.sent3: The ovalbumin and the yolk had a race to see who could reach the bowl first!
meanings.sent4: The ovalbumin is the star of the show when it comes to the protein content of egg white.
meanings.sent5: The ovalbumin is like the MVP of egg white, essential for its nutritional value.
